item.title: Zenyatta Ability Overview | Overwatch

meta.summary:
b'True self is without form: http://bit.ly/MeetZenyatta

Zenyatta is an omnic monk who wanders the world in search of spiritual enlightenment, helping those he meets to overcome their personal struggles and find inner peace. But, when necessary, he will fight to protect the innocent.

Calling upon powerful orbs that can heal allies and weaken opponents, Zenyatta is a critical resource on the battlefield. In times of great need, Zenyatta can enter a transcendent state for a brief period of time, becoming immune to damage and healing all nearby teammates. 

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch'

item.title: Overwatch - Zenyatta Guide - Pass Into The Iris (Tips and Advice)

meta.summary:
b'Zenyatta is one hell of a support. Hes extremely difficult to play, in this Zenyatta guide video Ill give tips and advice on how to best use him. Juggling harmony orb targets while maintaining discord orb on the enemy (both line of sight dependant) is key. Please be aware, hes one of the most difficult characters in the game to use effectively.

meta.summary:

Today we are talking about how the grandmaster zenyatta player shadowburn can carry his competitive games in season 6 overwatch competitive ranked mode. Going over some zenyatta season 6 tips and guide or whatever you want to call it. thanks!




More Videos! : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df




Playlist:https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df

Video From: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1lGztO8dGVY


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------






What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 26 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'

meta.summary:
b"THIS HERO IS AWESOME!

Zenyatta came as a surprise to me when I picked him up because I didn't see allot of him in competitive. With literally no training I went in to competitive and did great with him. He isn't the best healer but he makes up for this with his ability to dish out tons of damage as well as debuff the enemy. Not only that but his health being 2/3 of it shields allows him to recover from most engagements without having to leave for a health pack. He is also incredibly easy to use if that wasn't clear!!! 

Score: 5/5"

item.title: Overwatch: ZENYATTA Guide | Hero Abilities + Character Strategy | Zenyatta Tips & Tricks

meta.summary:
b"Overwatch Zenyatta Advanced Guide + Ability Tips, focusing on the Support Character Zenyatta. In-depth Hero guide on Zenyatta's abilities and Weapons, plus strategy, tactics, tips + tricks on using them. (for PS4, Xbox One, PC) (Zenyatta Gameplay Montage shown in Background)

Overwatch: ZENYATTA Guide In-Depth | Hero Abilities + Character Strategy | Zenyatta Tips & Tricks (Advanced)

Overwatch - Zenyatta Abilities and Weapons Analysis:

Orb of Destruction

Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs either individually, or in a rapid-fire volley after a few seconds spent gathering power.

Orb of Harmony

Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. So long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight, the orb slowly restores health to his ally. Only one ally can receive the orb's benefit at a time.

Orb of Discord

Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive for as long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orb's effects at a time.

Ultimate Ability: Transcendence

Zenyatta enters a state of heightened existence for a short period of time. While transcendent, Zenyatta cannot use abilities or weapons, but is immune to damage and automatically restores his health and that of nearby allies.

All Overwatch Heroes and Characters (in Base-game) Include: Bastion, D.Va, Genji, Hanzo, Junkrat, Lucio, McCree, Mei, Mercy, Pharah, Reaper, Reinhardt, Roadhog, Soldier: 76, Symmetra, Torbjorn, Tracer, Widowmaker, Winston, Zarya and Zenyatta

(Stats and details may change overtime due to patches and updates)

What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 24 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'
